verses.verse: I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou canst <S%H3201>do<s%> all <S%H4209>things<s%>, And that no purpose of thine can be <S%H1219>restrained<s%>.

Who is this that <S%H5956>hideth<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>? Therefore have I <S%H5046>uttered<s%> that which I <S%H995>understood<s%> <S%H6381>not<s%>, Things too wonderful for <S%H3045>me<s%>, which I knew not.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, I beseech <S%H1696>thee<s%>, and I will speak; I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of <S%H3045>thee<s%>, and declare thou unto me.
I had <S%H8085>heard<s%> of thee by the <S%H8088>hearing<s%> of the <S%H241>ear<s%>; But now mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> seeth <S%H7200>thee<s%>:
Wherefore I <S%H3988>abhor<s%> <S%H5162>myself<s%>, And repent in <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes<s%>.

And it was <S%H310>so<s%>, that, after <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, My <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8147>thee<s%>, and against thy two <S%H7453>friends<s%>; for ye have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of me the thing that is <S%H3559>right<s%>, as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> Job <S%H347>hath<s%>.

Now <S%H3947>therefore<s%>, take unto you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>, and offer <S%H5927>up<s%> for yourselves a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>; and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H6440>you<s%>; for him will I <S%H5375>accept<s%>, that I <S%H6213>deal<s%> not with you after your <S%H5039>folly<s%>; for ye have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of me the thing that is <S%H3559>right<s%>, as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> Job <S%H347>hath<s%>.

So <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> according as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>: and Jehovah <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>Job<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%>, when he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for his <S%H7453>friends<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3254>gave<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> twice as much as he had <S%H4932>before<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> there unto him all his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and all his <S%H269>sisters<s%>, and all they that had been of his <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with him in his <S%H1004>house<s%>: and they <S%H5110>bemoaned<s%> <S%H5162>him<s%>, and comforted him concerning all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> upon <S%H376>him<s%>: every man also <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H259>a<s%> piece of <S%H7192>money<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> ring of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

So <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the latter <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> more than his <S%H7225>beginning<s%>: And he had <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H860>she-asses<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%>, <S%H3224>Jemimah<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H7103>Keziah<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%>, <S%H7163>Keren-happuch<s%>.

And in all the <S%H776>land<s%> were no <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> so <S%H3303>fair<s%> as the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%>: and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> this <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons<s%>, even <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
